title: Cant login to alpha or legacy client.
body: When i open the alpha client and login it says "An Error has occurred while logging in, please try again later." and if i click sign in again it says authenticating and loads forever. I would just use the legacy client, but when i try to login it says "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.". I tried uninstalling and reinstalling and repairing, but that didn't change anything.

replies.body: same with me plus when i close it it doesn't reopen like wtf
Same. Can't do anything on either client. Used the Repair Tool but I repatched and it still doesn't work.
I'm having the same problem. Hopefully someone can resolve the issue.

It soundsl ike you're having trouble communicating with the login servers, so you can't authenticate and get in.  I wasn't able to find any issues with the servers that would preventing logging in.  What happens if you trying logging in through the legacy client instead:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that gets you through.

I've already tried launching the legacy client several times. This is the error it's been giving me: https://gyazo.com/076c1a8db31c872e973b717eb18f8705

However, I am typing this from my computer which is actually connected to the internet and is able to run other games.

We'd like to get some more information with your specific issue to see if we can find out more.  When you have a chance, return to the legacy client's patcher and click on the ? icon next to the gear icon on the top right.  There should be an option to **Save Logs**. 

Grab those logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this and likely forward it to interested parties to see if there is anything specifically causing a block.  We'll reply back asap!

Thanks for the help, Porocles. Saving the logs took me a little longer than expected, but I just submitted the ticket. The boards don't recognize my name change, so it should be under Bunny Bunny Uguu instead of Ethlin.
Received!  Thanks friend!
Logging in through the Legacy Client just produces an "unable to connect to the PVP.net server" message.

This may be a local network issue that's failing to establish a connection to our servers.  To help rule out possibilities, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is tuned up.  Let me know what you find.

After going through every solution provided in the connection issues guide, I am still unable to connect to the Pvp.net server. I have already submitted a support ticket on the issue yesterday and have provided logs from both the hextech repair tool and the legacy client launcher.

You've done a lot and it's much appreciated!  The troubleshooting done so far and logs in your ticket will help our tech and noc teams discover any widespread, isolated, ISP, or some other issues blocking access.  Thanks for your help!
Thank you for your patience and efforts in attempting to assist me and others suffering from this problem.
